import styles from './MovieDetails.module.scss' import { ArrowLeftOutlined, StarOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import Link from 'next/link'; import AddToFavorites from '../AddToFavorites/AddToFavorites'; function MovieDetails(props) { function formatNumberToCurrency(num) { return new Intl.NumberFormat('de-DE', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD' }).format(num) } return (

{props.movieDetails.title}

{props.movieDetails.tagline}

{props.movieDetails.vote_average}

{props.movieDetails.overview}

{props.movieDetails.genres.map(genre =>

{genre.name}

)}

Movie Information

Total revenue

{formatNumberToCurrency(props.movieDetails.revenue)}

Total budget

{formatNumberToCurrency(props.movieDetails.budget)}

Popularity

{props.movieDetails.popularity}

Runtime

{props.movieDetails.runtime} minutes

Release date

{props.movieDetails.release_date}

Go back

) } export default MovieDetails;
